divs: Sighting Detailsi walked outside at approx. 7:45 p.m. and i immediatly noticed 2 large bright objects in the north sky,they made no sound and appeared to be hovering and floating,i called to my husband and my roommate to look at them and they both were as interested as i was,we got the binos out of thr truck and took turns looking at them trying to see what they were.over the course of 15 mins these objects appeared big the small vanishing and reappearing 3 times.we tried to film them with the cell phone bur for some reason they wouldnt appear on the video!!!!.....on the 3rd and final appearance we saw 3 planes coming from eastwest and south ...they appeared to be trying to corral the objects between them,when they had the objects surrounded ....the 2 objects vanished....very odd.definatlwey NOT a plane.
Summary: 2 bright orange red objects appearing then vanishing 3 times before vanishing for good
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in San Jacinto
There were no other sightings in San Jacinto on or around March 17th 2013
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
